def sumO(N):
    s=0
    for i in range(1,len(str(N))+1):
        if (N%10)%2==0:
            s+= 2*(N%10)
        else:
            s+=(N%10)
        N=N/10
    return s
for i in range(int(raw_input())):
    m,n=map(int,raw_input().split(' '))
    d=0
    while m<n and m % 10:
        d += (sumO(m)%10)
        m += 1
    while m<n and n % 10:
        d += (sumO(n)%10)
        n -= 1
    d += 45 * ((n - m) / 10)
    d += (sumO(n)%10)
    print d
